title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Language Proficiency Enhancement Program in an Ecological Network Learning Environment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and elementary-level language comprehension skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners expand their basic vocabulary by 30% or more through collaborative language activities in an ecological network environment.
Learners achieve 80% or more of weekly learning goals using digital platforms and face-to-face sessions.

Learners will complete a 6-month conversational AI chatbot design project addressing public-sector real-world problems (e.g., civil complaint automation, community information systems). They will achieve an "excellent" rating in ≥4 of 5 evaluation categories: problem definition clarity, technical implementation completeness, user convenience, social impact, and sustainability.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
